title: BIP 27: DIGG Airdrop Clawback
body:
TLDR; clawback unclaimed DIGG airdrop after 7 days since launch of DIGG.

Overview
It is not useful to leave airdropped DIGG unclaimed. With the initial BADGER airdrop unclaimed BADGER was clawed back starting after 48 hours 20% at a time so after 7 days all unclaimed BADGER moved to community control. No scaling; after 7 days after official DIGG launch, all unclaimed DIGG will be clawed back and be under community control. Any uses for this unclaimed DIGG can be proposed in future BIPs.

Discussions: https://forum.badger.finance/t/bip-27-digg-clawback/2181
author: 0xa001B5639e4ed26dF58367016eB08850e3e55655
